children.name: Industrial Agriculture
children.description: Large-scale industrial farms growing nutrient-rich produce allows a civilization to grow its population manifold.

children.name: Eco Simulation
children.description: Farming techniques can be further refined through sophisticated computer simulations of different environments and weather patterns. This allows for more predictable crop yields.

children.name: Planetary Defenses
children.description: There may come a time when intellects, vast and cool and unsympathetic, regard our worlds with envy and draw plans against us. We must be ready.

children.name: Ground Defense Planning
children.description: There are many alien empires who would gladly seize our worlds for themselves. We must be prepared for them, should the worst come to pass.
weight_modifiers:
(×2.0) One must be true
• Has ethic_militarist Ethic
• Has ethic_fanatic_militarist Ethic

children.name: Global Defense Grid
children.description: The strategic value of a good defense remains as relevant today as it was to our predecessors in the far distant past. Technology does not render fortifications obsolete - it merely changes their requirements.
weight_modifiers:
(×2.0) One must be true
• Has ethic_militarist Ethic
• Has ethic_fanatic_militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Is specialist subject

children.description: Gradual adaptation to the realities of deep-space combat allows us to effectively coordinate larger maneuvers.

children.name: Admiralty Support Staff
children.description: Improving the support staff available to our commanders will increase the number of ships they can lead in a single fleet.

children.name: Doctrine: Fleet Support
children.description: As extrasolar expeditions become more common, it is important to provide planetside relief for returning fleets.
weight_modifiers:
(×2.0) One must be true
• Has ethic_militarist Ethic
• Has ethic_fanatic_militarist Ethic

children.name: Doctrine: Support Vessels
children.description: A fleet does not run on zeal alone. To ensure steady access to critical supplies, we should organize our logistics corps into dedicated support vessels.
weight_modifiers:
(×2.0) One must be true
• Has ethic_militarist Ethic
• Has ethic_fanatic_militarist Ethic

children.name: Doctrine: Interstellar Logistics
children.description: Amateurs talk about tactics. Professionals study logistics. By ensuring our fleets are regularly and efficiently supplied, we can increase the number of vessels we can effectively support.
weight_modifiers:
(×2.0) One must be true
• Has ethic_militarist Ethic
• Has ethic_fanatic_militarist Ethic

children.name: Doctrine: Fleet Liaisons
children.description: By maintaining a professional corps of fleet liaisons, we can improve communications and the flow of orders throughout the chain of command.
weight_modifiers:
(×2.0) One must be true
• Has ethic_militarist Ethic
• Has ethic_fanatic_militarist Ethic

children.name: Fleet Management Procedures
children.description: Improved fleet management procedures will free up the resources needed to maintain a bigger fleet.

children.name: Adaptive Combat Algorithms
children.description: Organics often fight using illogical and unpredictable tactics that can be difficult to effectively counter. Adaptive tactics and new, more maneuverable warforms should provide a decisive advantage.
potential: Has auth_machine_intelligence Authority

children.name: Biomechanics
children.description: Millions of years of organic evolution will sometimes, through sheer persistence, produce elegant solutions that can also be applied to machine designs.
weight_modifiers:
(×0.1) All must be false

• Has trait null in council

children.description: A body of knowledge regarding combat behaviors is useless without a strong code governing its use.
weight_modifiers:
(×2.0) One must be true

• Has ethic_fanatic_militarist Ethic

children.name: Refit Standards
children.description: Standardizing workflows for upgrading and retrofitting ship components can lead to massive efficiency gains.
weight_modifiers:
(×2.0) One must be true

• Has ethic_fanatic_militarist Ethic

children.name: Command Matrix
children.description: Restructuring the chain of command and deciding what interdependencies are set between officers, make fleets more responsive and effective.
weight_modifiers:
(×2.0) One must be true
• Has ethic_militarist Ethic
• Has ethic_fanatic_militarist Ethic

children.name: Centralized Command
children.description: Creating dedicated headquarters for all levels of military operations shapes an efficient fleet, and lays a better foundation for future military training.
weight_modifiers:
(×2.0) One must be true
• Has ethic_militarist Ethic
• Has ethic_fanatic_militarist Ethic

children.name: Combat Training
children.description: A more extensive training program for new recruits, including realistic combat scenarios, prepare them for the field.
weight_modifiers:
(×2.0) One must be true
• Has ethic_militarist Ethic
• Has ethic_fanatic_militarist Ethic

children.name: Aggressive Conditioning
children.description: Iterating on the standard conditioning regimen for ground troops has proven to make them more effective in direct combat.

children.name: Nerve Dampeners
children.description: Careful tuning of pain receptors allow soldiers to fight through what would previously have been debilitating injuries.

children.name: New Worlds Protocol
children.description: Calculating required resources and gear required to establish a planetary colony allows us to herd brave pioneers into grand "ark ships," confident that they will survive the long voyage across the stars to a new home.

children.name: Atmospheric Filtering
children.description: By adjusting atmospheric filtering on a per-site basis to better filter out undesirable elements, colonial living conditions may be improved.

children.description: Orbital systems of mirrors and shades can effect dramatic changes in planetary climates, when managed properly.

children.name: Xeno-Hydraulic Mastery
children.description: Sapient races have been reclaiming swampland for thousands of years. A coordinated system of modular aqueducts, pump stations, chemical remediation crawlers and automated soil compactors can reclaim land at unprecedented speeds.

children.description: Thorough cataloging, gene sequencing, and computer modeling of exobotanical ecosystems, coupled with gene editing and dispersal mechanisms, will allow us to reshape alien plant communities to our liking.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has tr_expansion_adopt Tradition
(×4.0) Has ap_mastery_of_nature Ascension Perk

children.name: Soil Remediation
children.description: The process of soil deposition normally takes millions of years. With advanced fracking, chemical engineering, and hydraulic management technologies even the poorest substrate can be turned into fertile topsoil.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has tr_expansion_adopt Tradition

children.name: Ocean Ecology Management
children.description: Given enough processing power, networked sensors and distributed stations, even the ocean currents can be managed to a fine level of control.

children.name: Deep Crust Engineering
children.description: Advances in material technology and deep-shaft mining techniques allow geo-engineering at previously unthinkable depths and temperatures. Magma hotspots can now be exploited, suppressed, or even relocated.

(×4.0) Has ap_mastery_of_nature Ascension Perk

children.name: Terrestrial Sculpting
children.description: There is no simple solution to the problem of macro-scale reshaping of planetary crusts - only bigger trowels and orbitally-deployed drills.
weight_modifiers: (×0.0) Has Government Civic: civic_hive_devouring_swarm
(×1.25) Has tr_expansion_adopt Tradition

children.name: Ecological Adaptation
children.description: By adapting planetary ecosystems to large-scale environmental changes we can turn terraformation into a less disruptive process.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has tr_expansion_adopt Tradition

children.name: Climate Restoration
children.description: By advancing our understanding of atmospheric transformation, we will be able to terraform even the most ecologically devastated worlds.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has tr_expansion_adopt Tradition

children.name: Planetary Resurfacing
children.description: With the advent of clean fusion, automation, and matter compression technologies, it was only a matter of time before mountain top removal became mountain range removal.

(×4.0) Has ap_mastery_of_nature Ascension Perk

children.name: Agrarian Utopias
children.description: Through the establishment of weather-controlled rural communes, we can support a larger population without disrupting our agrarian way of life.

children.name: Ascension Theory
children.description: Our history is a repeating cycle of dramatic technological, political, and cultural leaps; these leaps are often preceded by periods of upheaval and followed by times of relative stability. By identifying the core, recurring premises of these leaps, we may be able to effectively short-circuit the cycle for our own benefit.

• Has trait null in council
